item.title: Analytics Platform
item.description: Our offset analytics platform is the the de facto research tool for professionals seeking to maximize offset purchase efficiency. Thereâ€™s no comparable mechanism out there for performing data analysis across registries. Data fields are homogenized across registries to ensure apples-to-apples comparisons. Our smart database structures and aggregates information from 14,696 projects across 5 major registries, representing 2,341 unique project developers operating in 151 countries. In total, we have clean data underpinning more than 3 billion credits.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Rich Content
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.

item.title: Placeholder Text
item.description: Lorem est tota propiore conpellat pectoribus de pectora summo.

item.title: Math Typesetting
item.description: Mathematical notation in a Hugo project can be enabled by using third party JavaScript libraries.

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.

item.title: About
item.description: A modern offset analytics system that helps the worlds best companies find or develop the most effective credits.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Please send any inquiries to cleveroffsets@gmail.com
